_source.text: A few years ago the RIAA had the golden oppotunity to take the lead in digital music for better (offering it at a reasonable price and not locked down) or worse (as soon as digital music appeared start locking it down with DRM) but for some reason they didn't and now they wanna cry foul because they aren't making the lion's share of profit anymore.
